Gerhard Lazu Archive

Going live « 07 May 2010

It’s not pretty and it’s not using the app that I wanted, but I’ve been sitting on this blog long enough. I just want to write about my development stuff and the quickest way from A to B will have to do – for now.

This new blog is powered by Jekyll, deployed via git-deploy. I’ve been in the Ruby world long enough to know how much better it is than – sigh – PHP. I just wanted to manage everything via Textmate, do version control with git and do quick deploys without messing with FTP. When I write a new post, I just do cap deploy and all is taken care of.

I still have a long way to go before I reach the same level of beauty as Peepcode’s blog, but for now I just want to offload all the day-in day-out development stuff.
